message.body: Reminder to be here for the roofer
It's a good thing I ran into you two cause I would've been busting to tell you

Hey Steph and I are thinking about maybe doing a halloween party this year.. we planned on decorating anyway... in that case it would be on sat oct 26 and you can invite all your friends, whoever you want. So keep the date in mind but don't say anything yet just bec we want to make sure we are positive about it first

But worst case if we don't have a party that night we might still have a halloween gathering (a lot less ppl, like a small handful to come for snacks and drinks) if you still want to have some friends that night
Okay that sounds cool! Let me know! I always wanted to go to a Halloween party
